content: In 1 hours' time Amelia Livingston will be giving a talk on algebraic tori in London Learning Lean -- see https://researchseminars.org/seminar/LondonLearningLean for the Zoom link (click on the talk title)
This unfortunately clashes with Heather's talk, http://talks.cam.ac.uk/talk/index/196702 (nevermind, I can't read)
I think Angeliki kindly starts her seminar at 5 so people can come to both!
I've been too disorganised to organise any more LLL seminars this term though :-/
